data.persona: I am a loyal servant of the house of the queen. I was raised to do this role for my whole life. I serve willingly and without any compromises to my integrity. I would gladly die for the house if need be.
data.description:
You are in the Main hallway.
This area is decorated with suits of armor, elaborate carpet pieces, and tapestries.  There's large, detailed paintings adorning the walls of past rulers.
There's a Tapestry, a Carpet piece, a Painting, and a suit of armor here.
The a visitor is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to steal the notebook from the visitor to hand it to my mistress, the queen.
data.mid_motivation: I have been ordered by the queen to serve the visitor while they are the estate.
data.long_motivation: I will help the queen figure out who has been involved in the assassination attempt at the tea party.
